name: Survival Game (blockmanblue)
description:
A small survival game made in Java.  There are no enemies and all you have to worry about is your hunger, and maybe the friend you're playing with...

There is a shop that randomly teleports around the oddly boxy island that will buy and sell many things, including a totem that you can revive your friend with should you be playing hardcore.

Here is a list of the Game Rules and what they do:

PVP: players can only damage each other if this is set to true

DAYCYCLE: if true, the land will become dark, the shop also moves based off of this, so it disables that if false as well

PLAYERS: how many players are in the game

SHOWCOORDS: if coordinates are shown in the menu

HUNGER: if true, the player will lose hunger and die if not taken care of

MOVESHOP: if false, the shop will not move at the end of the day, please keep in mind it still moves when loading the save, and if DAYCYCLE is false, this does nothing

HARDCORE: if true, players will not respawn. if there is another player, they can use a totem to revive the other player, but otherwise, you can only float around in your ghostly appearance
